missions.title: [INF] in {systemname}
missions.value:
Wolves of Jonai command would like to increase [b]{factionname}[/b] and their [b]Influence[/b] in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System.

To achieve this goal Wolves of Jonai command recommends:
[ul]
[li]Complete missions for the {factionname} in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System[/li]
[li]Complete passenger contracts for the {factionname} in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System[/li]
[li]Hand in Bounties Vouchers for the {factionname} at any Station in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System[/li]
[li]Conduct profitable trade at any {factionname} owned Stations in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b][/li]
[li]Sell exploration data to any {factionname} owned Stations in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b][/li]
[/ul]

Select the [b]“Influence”[/b] mission reward whenever possible.

If you wish to know where the current Conflicts are at, you can find out the scores on discord or located at this page [url=https://inara.cz/elite/minorfaction-conflicts/31555/]Wolves Of Jonai Conflicts[/url] (Just click the filter called: [b]Just faction conflicts[/b])

If you have [b]any[/b] questions about the mission, you can ask us in the BGS-Redwolves channel on Discord.
Join the Wolves of Jonai Community Discord:
[url=http://discord.gg/6CzTtP5]http://discord.gg/6CzTtP5[/url]

[b][color=#1E92F7]Jonai command note[/color][/b]: This mission started on {dateofmission} in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] system.

missions.title: [ELE] in {systemname}
missions.value:
[b]{factionname}[/b] currently has a [b]Election[/b] in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] Support the {factionname} in this Election!

 To achieve this goal Wolves Of Jonai command recommends:
[ul]
[li]Complete missions for the {factionname} in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System[/li]
[li]Complete passenger contracts for the {factionname} in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System[/li]
[li]Conduct profitable trade at {factionname} owned Stations in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b][/li]
[li]Sell exploration data to {factionname} owned Stations in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b][/li]
[/ul]

Select the [b]“influence”[/b] mission reward whenever possible.

If you wish to know where the current Conflicts are at, you can find out the scores on discord or located at this page [url=https://inara.cz/elite/minorfaction-conflicts/31555/]Wolves Of Jonai Conflicts[/url] (Just click the filter called: [b]Just faction conflicts[/b])

If you have [b]any[/b] questions about the mission, you can ask us in the BGS-Redwolves channel on Discord.
Join the Wolves of Jonai Community Discord:
[url=http://discord.gg/6CzTtP5]http://discord.gg/6CzTtP5[/url]

[b][color=#1E92F7]Jonai command note[/color][/b]: This mission started on {dateofmission} in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] system so should end on the {enddateofmission}. Note the Conflict can end earlier if either faciton has a score advantage that means the other faction can not win or match to draw.

missions.title: [WAR] in {systemname}
missions.value:
[b]{factionname}[/b] are at [b]War[/b] in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b]! Help the {factionname} to win this conflict.

To win this war in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b], Wolves Of Jonai command would like you to do the following:

[ul]
[li]Do Massacre missions for the {factionname} in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System;[/li]
[li]Do Wartime and Strategic missions for the {factionname} in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System;[/li]
[li]Successfully complete combat zone scenarios for the {factionname} in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System;[/li]
[li]Hand in {factionname} Combat Bonds from the Combat Zones to any Station in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b];[/li]
[li]Hand in {factionname} Bounty Vouchers to any Station in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b]. [/li]
[/ul]

If you wish to know where the current Conflicts are at, you can find out the scores on discord or located at this page [url=https://inara.cz/elite/minorfaction-conflicts/31555/]Wolves Of Jonai Conflicts[/url] (Just click the filter called: [b]Just faction conflicts[/b])

If you have [b]any[/b] questions about the mission, you can ask us in the BGS-Redwolves channel on Discord.
Join the Wolves of Jonai Community Discord:
[url=http://discord.gg/6CzTtP5]http://discord.gg/6CzTtP5[/url]

[b][color=#1E92F7]Jonai command note[/color][/b]: This mission started on {dateofmission} in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] system so should end on the {enddateofmission}. Note the Conflict can end earlier if either faciton has a score advantage that means the other faction can not win or match to draw.
